00037 #include <linux/fs.h>
00038 #include <linux/mm.h>
00039 #include <linux/stat.h>
00040 #include <linux/version.h>
00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LLITE
00042 
00043 #include "llite_internal.h"
00044 
00045 static int ll_readlink_internal(struct inode *inode,
00046                                 struct ptlrpc_request **request, char **symname)
00047 {
00048         struct ll_inode_info *lli = ll_i2info(inode);
00049         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_i2sbi(inode);
00050         int rc, symlen = i_size_read(inode) + 1;
00051         struct mdt_body *body;
00052         struct md_op_data *op_data;
00053         ENTRY;
00054 
00055         *request = NULL;
00056 
00057         if (lli->lli_symlink_name) {
00058                 int print_limit = min_t(int, PAGE_SIZE - 128, symlen);
00059 
00060                 *symname = lli->lli_symlink_name;
00061                 /* If the total CDEBUG() size is larger than a page, it
00062                  * will print a warning to the console, avoid this by
00063                  * printing just the last part of the symlink. */
00064                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "using cached symlink %s%.*s, len = %d\n",
00065                        print_limit < symlen ? "..." : "", print_limit,
00066                        (*symname) + symlen - print_limit, symlen);
00067                 RETURN(0);
00068         }
00069 
00070         op_data = ll_prep_md_op_data(NULL, inode, NULL, NULL, 0, symlen,
00071                                      LUSTRE_OPC_ANY, NULL);
00072         if (IS_ERR(op_data))
00073                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(op_data));
00074 
00075         op_data->op_valid = OBD_MD_LINKNAME;
00076         rc = md_getattr(sbi->ll_md_exp, op_data, request);
00077         ll_finish_md_op_data(op_data);
00078         if (rc) {
00079                 if (rc != -ENOENT)
00080                         CERROR("%s: inode "DFID": rc = %d\n",
00081                                ll_get_fsname(inode->i_sb, NULL, 0),
00082                                PFID(ll_inode2fid(inode)), rc);
00083                 GOTO (failed, rc);
00084         }
00085 
00086         body = req_capsule_server_get(&(*request)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00087         LASSERT(body != NULL);
00088         if ((body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_LINKNAME) == 0) {
00089                 CERROR("OBD_MD_LINKNAME not set on reply\n");
00090                 GOTO(failed, rc = -EPROTO);
00091         }
00092 
00093         LASSERT(symlen != 0);
00094         if (body->mbo_eadatasize != symlen) {
00095                 CERROR("%s: inode "DFID": symlink length %d not expected %d\n",
00096                        ll_get_fsname(inode->i_sb, NULL, 0),
00097                        PFID(ll_inode2fid(inode)), body->mbo_eadatasize - 1,
00098                        symlen - 1);
00099                 GOTO(failed, rc = -EPROTO);
00100         }
00101 
00102         *symname = req_capsule_server_get(&(*request)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_MD);
00103         if (*symname == NULL ||
00104             strnlen(*symname, symlen) != symlen - 1) {
00105                 /* not full/NULL terminated */
00106                 CERROR("%s: inode "DFID": symlink not NULL terminated string"
00107                        "of length %d\n", ll_get_fsname(inode->i_sb, NULL, 0),
00108                        PFID(ll_inode2fid(inode)), symlen - 1);
00109                 GOTO(failed, rc = -EPROTO);
00110         }
00111 
00112         OBD_ALLOC(lli->lli_symlink_name, symlen);
00113         /* do not return an error if we cannot cache the symlink locally */
00114         if (lli->lli_symlink_name) {
00115                 memcpy(lli->lli_symlink_name, *symname, symlen);
00116                 *symname = lli->lli_symlink_name;
00117         }
00118         RETURN(0);
00119 
00120 failed:
00121         RETURN (rc);
00122 }
00123 
00124 #ifdef HAVE_SYMLINK_OPS_USE_NAMEIDATA
00125 static void *ll_follow_link(struct dentry *dentry, struct nameidata *nd)
00126 {
00127         struct inode *inode = dentry->d_inode;
00128         struct ptlrpc_request *request = NULL;
00129         int rc;
00130         char *symname = NULL;
00131         ENTRY;
00132 
00133         CDEBUG(D_VFSTRACE, "VFS Op\n");
00134         /* Limit the recursive symlink depth to 5 instead of default
00135          * 8 links when kernel has 4k stack to prevent stack overflow.
00136          * For 8k stacks we need to limit it to 7 for local servers. */
00137         if (THREAD_SIZE < 8192 && current->link_count >= 6) {
00138                 rc = -ELOOP;
00139         } else if (THREAD_SIZE == 8192 && current->link_count >= 8) {
00140                 rc = -ELOOP;
00141         } else {
00142                 ll_inode_size_lock(inode);
00143                 rc = ll_readlink_internal(inode, &request, &symname);
00144                 ll_inode_size_unlock(inode);
00145         }
00146         if (rc) {
00147                 ptlrpc_req_finished(request);
00148                 request = NULL;
00149                 symname = ERR_PTR(rc);
00150         }
00151 
00152         nd_set_link(nd, symname);
00153         /* symname may contain a pointer to the request message buffer,
00154          * we delay request releasing until ll_put_link then.
00155          */
00156         RETURN(request);
00157 }
00158 #else
00159 static const char *ll_follow_link(struct dentry *dentry, void **cookie)
00160 {
00161         struct inode *inode = d_inode(dentry);
00162         struct ptlrpc_request *request;
00163         char *symname = NULL;
00164         int rc;
00165         ENTRY;
00166 
00167         CDEBUG(D_VFSTRACE, "VFS Op\n");
00168         ll_inode_size_lock(inode);
00169         rc = ll_readlink_internal(inode, &request, &symname);
00170         ll_inode_size_unlock(inode);
00171         if (rc < 0) {
00172                 ptlrpc_req_finished(request);
00173                 return ERR_PTR(rc);
00174         }
00175 
00176         /* symname may contain a pointer to the request message buffer,
00177          * we delay request releasing until ll_put_link then.
00178          */
00179         *cookie = request;
00180         RETURN(symname);
00181 }
00182 #endif /* HAVE_SYMLINK_OPS_USE_NAMEIDATA */
00183 
00184 #ifdef HAVE_SYMLINK_OPS_USE_NAMEIDATA
00185 static void ll_put_link(struct dentry *dentry, struct nameidata *nd, void *cookie)
00186 #else
00187 static void ll_put_link(struct inode *unused, void *cookie)
00188 #endif
00189 {
00190         ptlrpc_req_finished(cookie);
00191 }
00192 
00193 struct inode_operations ll_fast_symlink_inode_operations = {
00194         .readlink       = generic_readlink,
00195         .setattr        = ll_setattr,
00196         .follow_link    = ll_follow_link,
00197         .put_link       = ll_put_link,
00198         .getattr        = ll_getattr,
00199         .permission     = ll_inode_permission,
00200         .setxattr       = ll_setxattr,
00201         .getxattr       = ll_getxattr,
00202         .listxattr      = ll_listxattr,
00203         .removexattr    = ll_removexattr,
00204 };
